# GPX Tools

[![CI](https://github.com/neri14/gpxt/actions/workflows/ci.yml/badge.svg?branch=master)](https://github.com/neri14/gpxt/actions/workflows/ci.yml)
[![Coverage Status](https://codecov.io/gh/neri14/gpxt/branch/master/graph/badge.svg)](https://codecov.io/gh/neri14/gpxt)
[![PyPI - Version](https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/gpxt)](https://pypi.org/project/gpxt/)

[![Python 3.12+](https://img.shields.io/badge/python-3.12+-blue.svg)](https://www.python.org/downloads/)

**GPX Tools** - A collection of tools to work with GPX files, a younger cousin of [FITT](https://github.com/neri14/fitt).
